name: 劳伦·雷瓦尔德
name_full: 劳伦·雷瓦尔德 Lauren Revard

last_movies.title: 末日巡逻队 第一季

introduction: Lauren Revard was born in New Orleans, LA and grew up in Forsyth, GA. She graduated from Georgia State University as a Theatre major and Film minor. While at Georgia State, she founded Twinhead Theatre Company and began classes at Whole World Improv Theatre, where she met her husband and fellow actor, Eric Goins. She performed at Whole World from 2004 - 2014 and became the Student Director there from 2009 -2014. Lauren has also performed as an improviser with Village Theatre and Highwire Comedy. She can also be seen performing with her best friend troupe, The Buskers.In 2010, she co-founded Yes And Films, LLC and has worked as a writer and producer for clients such as Turner Original Productions, Coca Cola, UPS, Golden Girls, LLC, Preparis, Georgia Public Broadcasting, and Whole World Improv Theatre.
